sru:extraResponseData.fcs:transformedQuery: SELECT ndx.txt, base.entry, base.sid, COUNT(*) FROM aeb_eng_001__v001 AS base INNER JOIN (SELECT ndx.id, ndx.txt FROM (SELECT tab.id, tab.xpath, tab.txt FROM aeb_eng_001__v001_ndx AS tab INNER JOIN (SELECT inner.id FROM aeb_eng_001__v001_ndx AS `inner` WHERE inner.txt = 'released' AND inner.xpath LIKE '%-change-f-status-') AS prefid ON tab.id = prefid.id WHERE tab.txt != '-') AS ndx WHERE (ndx.txt = '4') AND ((ndx.xpath LIKE '%-bibl-%Course-'))) AS ndx ON base.id = ndx.id GROUP BY base.sid LIMIT 0, 200

cit.quote: to sit; to take a seat; to stay
Please sit down! What do you drink?
Bitte setzt euch! Was trinkt ihr?
Prenez place s’il vous plaît! Qu’est ce que vous buvez?

cit.quote: māši l-il-bānka bāš nižbid šwayya flūs.
I go to the bank to withdraw some money.
Ich gehe zur Bank, um etwas Geld abzuheben.
Je vais à la banque pour retirer un peu d’argent.

cit.quote: A: How are you? - B: Fine, as usual.
A: Wie geht es dir? - B: Gut, wie immer.
A: Comment vas-tu? - B: Bien, comme d’habitude.

cit.quote: nḥibb il-maqṛūna āma nḥibb il-kusksi xīr.
I like noodles, but I prefer couscous.
Ich mag Nudeln, aber ich bevorzuge Kuskus.
J aime les pâtes, mais je préfère le couscous.
